AddClientIDToOpenIDConnectProvider.description: The following add-client-id-to-open-id-connect-provider command adds the client ID my-application-ID to the OIDC provider named server.example.com:
AddClientIDToOpenIDConnectProvider.title: To add a client ID (audience) to an Open-ID Connect (OIDC) provider

AddRoleToInstanceProfile.description: The following command adds the role named S3Access to the instance profile named Webserver:
AddRoleToInstanceProfile.title: To add a role to an instance profile

AddUserToGroup.description: The following command adds an IAM user named Bob to the IAM group named Admins:
AddUserToGroup.title: To add a user to an IAM group

AttachGroupPolicy.description: The following command attaches the AWS managed policy named ReadOnlyAccess to the IAM group named Finance.
AttachGroupPolicy.title: To attach a managed policy to an IAM group

AttachRolePolicy.description: The following command attaches the AWS managed policy named ReadOnlyAccess to the IAM role named ReadOnlyRole.
AttachRolePolicy.title: To attach a managed policy to an IAM role

AttachUserPolicy.description: The following command attaches the AWS managed policy named AdministratorAccess to the IAM user named Alice.
AttachUserPolicy.title: To attach a managed policy to an IAM user

ChangePassword.description: The following command changes the password for the current IAM user.
ChangePassword.title: To change the password for your IAM user

CreateAccessKey.description: The following command creates an access key (access key ID and secret access key) for the IAM user named Bob.
CreateAccessKey.title: To create an access key for an IAM user

CreateAccountAlias.description: The following command associates the alias examplecorp to your AWS account.
CreateAccountAlias.title: To create an account alias

CreateGroup.description: The following command creates an IAM group named Admins.
CreateGroup.title: To create an IAM group

CreateInstanceProfile.description: The following command creates an instance profile named Webserver that is ready to have a role attached and then be associated with an EC2 instance.
CreateInstanceProfile.title: To create an instance profile

CreateLoginProfile.description: The following command changes IAM user Bob's password and sets the flag that required Bob to change the password the next time he signs in.
CreateLoginProfile.title: To create an instance profile

CreateOpenIDConnectProvider.description: The following example defines a new OIDC provider in IAM with a client ID of my-application-id and pointing at the server with a URL of https://server.example.com.
CreateOpenIDConnectProvider.title: To create an instance profile

CreateRole.description: The following command creates a role named Test-Role and attaches a trust policy to it that is provided as a URL-encoded JSON string.
CreateRole.title: To create an IAM role

CreateUser.description: The following create-user command creates an IAM user named Bob in the current account.
CreateUser.title: To create an IAM user

DeleteAccessKey.description: The following command deletes one access key (access key ID and secret access key) assigned to the IAM user named Bob.
DeleteAccessKey.title: To delete an access key for an IAM user

DeleteAccountAlias.description: The following command removes the alias mycompany from the current AWS account:
DeleteAccountAlias.title: To delete an account alias

DeleteAccountPasswordPolicy.description: The following command removes the password policy from the current AWS account:
DeleteAccountPasswordPolicy.title: To delete the current account password policy

DeleteGroupPolicy.description: The following command deletes the policy named ExamplePolicy from the group named Admins:
DeleteGroupPolicy.title: To delete a policy from an IAM group

DeleteInstanceProfile.description: The following command deletes the instance profile named ExampleInstanceProfile
DeleteInstanceProfile.title: To delete an instance profile

DeleteLoginProfile.description: The following command deletes the password for the IAM user named Bob.
DeleteLoginProfile.title: To delete a password for an IAM user

DeleteRole.description: The following command removes the role named Test-Role.
DeleteRole.title: To delete an IAM role

DeleteRolePolicy.description: The following command removes the policy named ExamplePolicy from the role named Test-Role.
DeleteRolePolicy.title: To remove a policy from an IAM role

DeleteSigningCertificate.description: The following command deletes the specified signing certificate for the IAM user named Anika.
DeleteSigningCertificate.title: To delete a signing certificate for an IAM user

DeleteUser.description: The following command removes the IAM user named Bob from the current account.
DeleteUser.title: To delete an IAM user

DeleteUserPolicy.description: The following delete-user-policy command removes the specified policy from the IAM user named Juan:
DeleteUserPolicy.title: To remove a policy from an IAM user

DeleteVirtualMFADevice.description: The following delete-virtual-mfa-device command removes the specified MFA device from the current AWS account.
DeleteVirtualMFADevice.title: To remove a virtual MFA device

GetAccountPasswordPolicy.description: The following command displays details about the password policy for the current AWS account.
GetAccountPasswordPolicy.title: To see the current account password policy

GetAccountSummary.description: The following command returns information about the IAM entity quotas and usage in the current AWS account.
GetAccountSummary.title: To get information about IAM entity quotas and usage in the current account

GetInstanceProfile.description: The following command gets information about the instance profile named ExampleInstanceProfile.
GetInstanceProfile.title: To get information about an instance profile

GetLoginProfile.description: The following command gets information about the password for the IAM user named Anika.
GetLoginProfile.title: To get password information for an IAM user

GetRole.description: The following command gets information about the role named Test-Role.
GetRole.title: To get information about an IAM role

GetUser.description: The following command gets information about the IAM user named Bob.
GetUser.title: To get information about an IAM user

ListAccessKeys.description: The following command lists the access keys IDs for the IAM user named Alice.
ListAccessKeys.title: To list the access key IDs for an IAM user

ListAccountAliases.description: The following command lists the aliases for the current account.
ListAccountAliases.title: To list account aliases

ListGroupPolicies.description: The following command lists the names of in-line policies that are embedded in the IAM group named Admins.
ListGroupPolicies.title: To list the in-line policies for an IAM group

ListGroups.description: The following command lists the IAM groups in the current account:
ListGroups.title: To list the IAM groups for the current account

ListGroupsForUser.description: The following command displays the groups that the IAM user named Bob belongs to.
ListGroupsForUser.title: To list the groups that an IAM user belongs to

ListSigningCertificates.description: The following command lists the signing certificates for the IAM user named Bob.
ListSigningCertificates.title: To list the signing certificates for an IAM user

ListUsers.description: The following command lists the IAM users in the current account.
ListUsers.title: To list IAM users

ListVirtualMFADevices.description: The following command lists the virtual MFA devices that have been configured for the current account.
ListVirtualMFADevices.title: To list virtual MFA devices

PutGroupPolicy.description: The following command adds a policy named AllPerms to the IAM group named Admins.
PutGroupPolicy.title: To add a policy to a group

PutRolePolicy.description: The following command adds a permissions policy to the role named Test-Role.
PutRolePolicy.title: To attach a permissions policy to an IAM role

PutUserPolicy.description: The following command attaches a policy to the IAM user named Bob.
PutUserPolicy.title: To attach a policy to an IAM user

RemoveRoleFromInstanceProfile.description: The following command removes the role named Test-Role from the instance profile named ExampleInstanceProfile.
RemoveRoleFromInstanceProfile.title: To remove a role from an instance profile

RemoveUserFromGroup.description: The following command removes the user named Bob from the IAM group named Admins.
RemoveUserFromGroup.title: To remove a user from an IAM group

UpdateAccessKey.description: The following command deactivates the specified access key (access key ID and secret access key) for the IAM user named Bob.
UpdateAccessKey.title: To activate or deactivate an access key for an IAM user

UpdateAccountPasswordPolicy.description: The following command sets the password policy to require a minimum length of eight characters and to require one or more numbers in the password:
UpdateAccountPasswordPolicy.title: To set or change the current account password policy

UpdateAssumeRolePolicy.description: The following command updates the role trust policy for the role named Test-Role:
UpdateAssumeRolePolicy.title: To update the trust policy for an IAM role

UpdateGroup.description: The following command changes the name of the IAM group Test to Test-1.
UpdateGroup.title: To rename an IAM group

UpdateLoginProfile.description: The following command creates or changes the password for the IAM user named Bob.
UpdateLoginProfile.title: To change the password for an IAM user

UpdateSigningCertificate.description: The following command changes the status of a signing certificate for a user named Bob to Inactive.
UpdateSigningCertificate.title: To change the active status of a signing certificate for an IAM user

UpdateUser.description: The following command changes the name of the IAM user Bob to Robert. It does not change the user's path.
UpdateUser.title: To change an IAM user's name

UploadServerCertificate.description: The following upload-server-certificate command uploads a server certificate to your AWS account:

input.CertificateBody: -----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----<a very long certificate text string>-----END CERTIFICATE-----
input.PrivateKey: -----BEGIN DSA PRIVATE KEY-----<a very long private key string>-----END DSA PRIVATE KEY-----

UploadServerCertificate.title: To upload a server certificate to your AWS account

UploadSigningCertificate.description: The following command uploads a signing certificate for the IAM user named Bob.
UploadSigningCertificate.title: To upload a signing certificate for an IAM user
